page.title: 14Games we like to play
page.content: My favourite game at school is{ {Rounders.}There are two teams, one fielding ,one batting. The fielding team has a bowler, backstop, 4 posts and fielders. The bowler bowls the ball and the first batter hits. If the bowler bowls too high or too low it is a{No Ball.}If it is hit, a fielder tries to catch it. If he succeeds the batsman is{Out.}If he misses then he tries to get the ball to a post to stop the batsman because if a batsman runs all the way round without stopping, it is a rounder. My favourite game at home is tennis. I play with a{Tennis Come Back}thing. It is a ball on a piece of elastic and when you hit it with a tennis racquet it comes back to you and you hit it again and again.
